testimonials.quote: Absolutely buzzing with my new piece! The team at Flesh really know their stuff and the atmosphere is spot on.
testimonials.author: Jake M.

testimonials.quote: Been going to Flesh for years now and they never disappoint. Clean studio, friendly artists, quality work every time.
testimonials.author: Emma K.

testimonials.quote: First tattoo and was proper nervous but the staff put me at ease. Really happy with how it turned out, would definitely go back.
testimonials.author: Ryan T.

paragraphs: Flesh opened its doors in Manchester's bustling city center because we believed the scene needed something different. Not just another tattoo shop, but a place where bold ideas come to life without compromise. Our reputation speaks for itself - nearly 1,000 five-star reviews from clients who trusted us with their vision.

Located at The Hadley Clinic on Bridge Street, we've become Manchester's go-to studio for those who want tattoos that make a statement. Our artists don't just follow trends - they set them. Whether you're after your first piece or adding to an existing collection, we approach every tattoo with the same level of dedication and skill.
about.callout: Every tattoo tells a story. We make sure it's one worth telling.
about.imageAlt: Flesh tattoo artist working on detailed custom piece

items.question: Do you take walk-ins?
items.answer: We do accept walk-ins for flash pieces when we have availability, but custom work is by appointment only. Give us a ring on 0161 706 2286 to check what's available on the day.

items.question: What's your deposit policy?
items.answer: We require a £50 deposit to secure your booking, which comes off your final bill. Deposits are non-refundable but can be transferred to a new date with 48 hours notice.

items.question: How do I prepare for my tattoo?
items.answer: Get a good night's sleep, eat a proper meal beforehand, stay hydrated, and avoid alcohol for 24 hours before your appointment. Wear comfortable clothes that give us easy access to the area being tattooed.

finalCta.headline: Ready for Your Next Tattoo?
finalCta.subheadline: Join the hundreds of satisfied clients who've trusted Flesh with their ink

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo idea and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to discuss details and availability.
